Pre-Game Insights: Gibraltar have struggled since securing qualification, conceding 19 goals in their last seven matches, including losses to Northern Ireland and the Netherlands.
Scotland will aim to end their poor run with a win against Gibraltar on Monday at Estadio Algarve.
Victory in either of these matches would mean a lot to Gibraltar.
Scotland might pull through with a victory and break their winless streak.
We predict a victory for the away side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Gibraltar’s last victory dates back to November 2022.
Scotland’s last six games have ended in four losses and two draws, with the last win dating back to September 2023.
